Preparatory committees formed abroad 
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees were formed in Zimbabwe and Mongolia on February 6 to celebrate the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il. 
 At the inaugural ceremonies chairman of the Zimbabwe-Korea Solidarity and Friendship Association Nelson Mawema and chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Association C.Surenjav were elected chairmen of the preparatory committees.    
 The committees decided to hold multifarious political and cultural events to celebrate February 16.
